thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 4 of 176
thread.title: Marrilyn

author: Marrilyn
title: Marrilyn
text: My experience with TrustedHousesitters have been amazing. The website is very easy to use and within a day I was getting email alerts on the assignments that are available in the Countries I have selected. Have already managed to confirm a few house/pet sits, with opportunities to be their long term sitter each time the owners go on holiday! The home owners are also very hospitable, offered me to food/drinks in their home and did their best to make me feel at home. I love house/pet sitting and take it as a free mini holiday/staycation. Plus, you get to play with awesome pets and meet their lovely owners. Thank you Trustedhousesitters!
